data.comment: Birmingham kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Jed Wallace (Millwall) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 28, Birmingham's Jonathan Leko has been booked in Birmingham.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Millwall kick-off.
In the minute 63, Matt Smith is on a sub for Troy Parrott for Millwall.
Aitor Karanka is making the team's first substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Jeremie Bela replacing Jonathan Leko.
Ivan Sunjic (Birmingham) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Millwall make their second substitution with Ben Thompson replacing Jed Wallace.
The away team replace Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson with Tom Bradshaw.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
